text: Aziz Ali (born September 15, 1980) is a Kenyan amateur boxer who qualified for the 2008 Olympics at light-heavyweight at the 2nd AIBA African 2008 Olympic Qualifying Tournament despite being knocked out by Bastie Samir in the last fight. At the Olympics, he lost his first bout 3:8 to Turkey's Bahram Muzaffer. ==External links== *Qualifier *sports-reference Category:Living people Category:Light-heavyweight boxers Category:Boxers at the 2008 Summer Olympics Category:Olympic boxers of Kenya Category:1980 births Category:Kenyan male boxers
title: Aziz Ali
